channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows

item.title: CVE-2018-18090|2024-09-17T00:51:03.175Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Out of bounds read in igdkm64.sys in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.
